title: Cosmic Canvas.
content: Welcome to Cosmic Canvas! Our website is dedicated to providing you with a visually stunning experience that will transport you to the far reaches of space. With our abstract deep space wallpaper, featuring swirling colors and patterns, you'll feel like you're exploring the mysteries of the universe from the comfort of your own device. Whether you're looking for inspiration, relaxation, or just a little bit of cosmic wonder, Cosmic Canvas has got you covered. So come on in, sit back, and let us take you on a journey through the cosmos! âœ¨ðŸš€ðŸŒŒ

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a deep space object, such as a black hole or pulsar, with swirling colors and patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
